contest-event.event-date:
June 21, 2008 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmans-festival-class-a
Salute to Youth
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Melody ('Elegiac Melody No. 2: Spring' - Grieg, arr. Pat Ryan): 1 St. Austell, 195 2 Camborne, 194 3 Wantage, 192 4 St. Keverne, 191 5 St. Dennis, 190
Best Player: Robert Jose, euphonium, Camborne Town
Best Soprano: Rachel Whitaker - St Austell Town Best Solo Cornet: Hannah Hawken - St Austell Town Best Euphonium: Robert Jose - Camborne Best Solo Horn: Mark Letcher- Camborne Best Set of Basses: St Austell Town
A.R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Joanna Rowe - St Dennis, Jacob Pritchard - St Dennis
Deportment (judge Gareth Roberts): 1 Helston Town (1st Section) 2 Bugle Silver (2nd Section)
Feb. 13, 2010, 6:24 p.m. Aug. 7, 2013, 1:11 p.m.
1 St. Austell Town Band Gareth Pritchard
2 Camborne Town Band Frank Renton
3 Wantage Silver Band Philip Bailey
4 St. Keverne Band Stuart Chappell
5 St. Dennis Band Brian Minear
